alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:42AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fremont and northwestern Pueblo Counties through 815 AM MDT... At 742 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Junkins Burn Scar, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Pueblo Reservoir, Salt Creek, Pueblo West, Penrose, Beulah and Colorado City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
